review: I have consulted cardiologist doctor Raghunandan B K for my mother. **** ****** ******** ** *** **** *** there is no value of times for doctor and also did not understand the importance of patient. Our waiting times are so long hours 3 hrs and after long waiting when we went doctor consultation room then he did not check up and not look into the report. One of the wasted our time behind this doctor I never recommend this doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had taken my mother for hypertension treatment . He is one  of the best doctors  in prescribing the medicines .
Whatever the medicines he gives and if you go for the second opinion they retain the medicines prescribed by him. I am very happy with the doctor even my dad also had visited him long back . Even today Dr.Raghunandan is remembered  for giving the right medication . Thanks so much doctor.
All investigations done in very less time and doctor is very knowledgeable and friendly. He explained all lifestyle changes for healthy heart
